name: Releasing False Labels
description: Dismantling negative identities imposed by narcissistic figures and social conditioning.

cards.title: Recognizing Imposed Labels
cards.description: Identifying the false identities placed on you by others.
cards.bulletpoints: Family Role Assignments, Societal Expectations, Emotional Programming

cards.title: Disrupting the Internalized Narrative
cards.description: Techniques to dismantle self-sabotaging thoughts and behaviors.
cards.bulletpoints: Cognitive Reframing, Emotional Validation Practices, Identity Deconstruction

cards.title: Symbolic Release and Reintegration
cards.description: Rituals and practices for permanently discarding false identities and reclaiming personal sovereignty.
cards.bulletpoints: Symbolic Object Discarding, Affirmation Rewiring, Visualization of Identity Shift
